lead_paragraph: Rodney Hood scored 24 points as the Utah Jazz avenged a loss to the Charlotte Hornets last week with a 102-73 victory on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Hood Scores 24 as Jazz Defeat Hornets 102-73
headline.main: Hood Scores 24 as Jazz Defeat Hornets 102-73
